mapper.select: SELECT BUYNUMBER , CATEGORY , OPTIONNAME , COUNT , TO_CHAR(PRICE, '999,999,999') AS PRICE , BUYSTATE , PRODUCTNUMBER , PNDNUMBER , FROMPERSON , TOPERSON , POST , ADDRESS , ADDRESS2 , PHONE , REVIEWNUMBER FROM BUY WHERE PNDNUMBER=#{pndNumber} ORDER BY BUYNUMBER
SELECT MEMBERID , NAME , BUYNUMBER , CATEGORY , OPTIONNAME , COUNT , TO_CHAR(PRICE, '999,999,999') AS PRICE , PRODUCTNUMBER FROM REVIEWPRODUCT WHERE BUYNUMBER=#{buyNumber}

SELECT BUYNUMBER , CATEGORY , OPTIONNAME , COUNT , PRICE , BUYSTATE , PRODUCTNUMBER , PNDNUMBER , FROMPERSON , TOPERSON ,POST , ADDRESS , ADDRESS2 , PHONE , REVIEWNUMBER FROM BUY WHERE FROMPERSON=#{fromPerson} AND PRODUCTNUMBER=#{productNumber}
